app.description: Displays customer, order, and subscription details from Infusionsoft
app.name: Infusionsoft App

subdomain.label: Infusionsoft App Name
subdomain.helpText: Enter only the first part of the subdomain here (for example: 'yourcompany').

token.label: API token
token.helpText: You can find your Infusionsoft API token in the Infusionsoft Admin settings section

contacts.empty: Could not match this end-user with an Infusionsoft contact. Try searching instead.
contacts.create: Create a contact for this end-user

global.limitReached: You reached the maximum limit of results to display. Contact Support for additional information.

default.title: An error has occurred
default.message: There was an error loading contact data. Try again later.

badGateway.message: There was an error connecting to Infusionsoft. Ensure that the Subdomain and API token are correct in your settings.

addTag.error: Failed to add tag to contact. Check to see if you have already added it.
addTag.title: Add tag to contact
